root.name: Sangokushi Taisen Ten
root.description: Sangokushi Taisen Ten is a Nintendo DS port of version 3.0 of Sega's Sangokushi Taisen, a real-time strategy game for arcades where players move around cards on a board to manipulate in-game units. This port has players move around virtual cards on the touch screen, instead of real ones. Shade ported the game.
